title: Amazon EventBridge to trigger Lambda to perform volume replication across file systems within/across accounts and regions
description: The SAM template deploys an Amazon EventBridge, to trigger a Lambda function which will get triggered based on user schedule to copy the snapshot of the volume and copy them to the target FSx system.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern sets up the following resources:
An Amazon EventBridge rule that triggers a Lambda function based on the schedule defined by the customer to take create snapshots of the provided FSx VolumeID.

A sample Lambda functions that creates snapshots of the source FSx VolumeID and replicates them by performing copy_snapshot_and_update_volume call to the target VolumeId in same account and same region.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
